name: Space Castle
description:
Space Strategy.


 A mix of tower hold games and role-playing action.

  • Arm your ship
  • Create tactics
  • arrange each combat module in the correct sequence
  • Increase levels and prove your superiority.

   To win, you will need to solve complex strategic problems, accurate calculation and search for the right tactics, this is the only way to a hard victory, if you are ready, then show what you are worth!

Strategy with an RPG element and an extensive scientific plot. Take the path from the pilot of the spacecraft to the fleet commander! Immerse yourself in the world of the future and help humanity find a new home.
  • More than a hundred creatures
  • More than a hundred combat modules
  • Tens of bosses
  • A dozen warships
  • Hundred locations to study
Joining together in alliances, pump your ship and terrify all rivals. Learn about all the developments of the future and get ready to become a hero!
